author: lowlydba
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

Allow for optional use of some (or all) [advanced markdig features](https://github.com/xoofx/markdig#usage) in the ConvertFrom-Markdown and related commands. Many of the common ones, like Pipe tables from Github Flavored Markdown, are used very frequently instead of HTML in markdown.

Allowing the advanced features to be available would greatly increase this command's usability with Github related markdown content and many other popular variations. 

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_

comments.author: michaeltlombardi
comments.body: This would require (I think) either adding a parameter to the Markdown cmdlets for additional extensions to load or loading all known extensions by default. I suspect the former would be better UX.

title: Allow for 'Advanced' mode in markdig for markdown transformations
